Package akka.cluster.sharding

Class DDataShardCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.cluster.sharding.ShardCoordinator
      • akka.cluster.sharding.DDataShardCoordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor, ActorLogging, Stash, StashSupport, UnrestrictedStash, RequiresMessageQueue<DequeBasedMessageQueueSemantics>
    public class DDataShardCoordinator
extends ShardCoordinator
implements Stash
    Singleton coordinator (with state based on ddata) that decides where to allocate shards.

    See Also:
    ClusterSharding extension
